name: Lad vs Hose
description:
most games are lame and bad, not having two games in one, but in this game it is a feature that you can play both crit and not as much crit at the same time to see who wins the intuitive crit mode vs who wins the normal mode! 

WebGL kinda broke and changed my 10 into 106, so enjoy that I guess, I will call that a feature
